Package casino.game

Class DefaultGame

java.lang.Object
casino.game.AbstractGame
casino.game.DefaultGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGame
public class DefaultGame
extends AbstractGame
represents a game in a casino. every game needs access to the gaming authority API for logging and for betting round activities and needs to have a gamerule.

    • DefaultGame

      public DefaultGame​(IBetLoggingAuthority betLoggingAuthority, IBetTokenAuthority betTokenAuthority, IGameRule gameRule) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Parameters:
      betLoggingAuthority - is the DefaultGame's IBetLoggingAuthority
      betTokenAuthority - is the DefaultGame's IBetTokenAuthority
      gameRule - is the DefaultGame's IGameRule
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Should:
      createAnAbstractGameWithPassedIBetLoggingAuthorityAndIBetTokenAuthorityAndIGameRule, throwIllegalArgumentExceptionWithNullIBetLoggingAuthorityOrIBetTokenAuthorityOrIGameRule, initializeConnectedMachineAndBettingRoundsSet

  • Method Details

    • startBettingRound

      public void startBettingRound()
      Description copied from interface: IGame
      create and start a new BettingRound. when called when a current bettinground is active: the current bettinground ends and a new bettinground is created, which becomes the current bettinground. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API
      Should:
      createNewBettingRoundAndAssignItAsTheCurrentBettingRound, callLogStartBettingRoundToLogTheNewCreatedBettingRound, addTheNewlyCreatedBettingRoundToTheListOfBettingRounds, emptyTheSetOfConnectedMachines

    • acceptBet

      public boolean acceptBet​(Bet bet, IGamingMachine gamingMachine) throws NoCurrentRoundException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, NoBetsMadeException, InvalidAmountException
      Description copied from interface: IGame
      Accept a bet on the current betting round. determine if the betting round is finished, if so: determine the winner, notify the connected gaming machines and start a new betting round. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API
      Parameters:
      bet - the bet to be made on the betting round
      gamingMachine - gamingmachine which places bet on this game.
      Returns:
      true if placing a bet on the betting round returns true, return false if the game machine passed already exist or placing the bet on the betting round returned false
      Throws:
      NoCurrentRoundException - if the current betting round is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter input in null
      NoBetsMadeException - its needed to call determineWinner which has this throw
      InvalidAmountException - its needed to call determineWinner function
      Should:
      throwIllegalArgumentExceptionWhenBetOrGamingMachineIsNull, throwNoCurrentRoundExceptionWhenTheCurrentBettingRoundIsNull, returnFalseIfTheGamingMachinePassedInTheParameterAlreadyExist, callPlaceBetOnTheCurrentBettingRoundByPassingTheBetAsParameter, triggerIsBettingRoundFinishedIfPlacingTheBetReturnedTrueAndCallGetMaxBetsPerRound, triggerDetermineWinnerIfIsBettingRoundFinishedReturnedTrueAndCallGetRandomInteger, callLogAddAcceptedBetOnBetLoggingAuthorityByPassingTheBetAndTheBettingRoundIDAndGamingMachineId, returnTrueIfTrueIsReturnedByPlaceBetOnTheCurrentBettingRound, returnFalseIfFalseIsReturnedByPlaceBetOnTheCurrentBettingRound, addTheGamingMachineToTheSetOFConnectedMachinesToHaveOnlyOneBetPerMachine

    • determineWinner

      public void determineWinner() throws NoBetsMadeException, InvalidAmountException
      Description copied from interface: IGame
      End the current bettinground and calculate the winner using the gamerules. notifiy all connected game machines of the BetResult. When no bets have been made yet, no winner can be determined. In this case, only log to the betlogging authority, and end the current bettinground. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API
      Throws:
      NoBetsMadeException - if no bets where placed on the current betting round
      InvalidAmountException - it is needed to call determineWinner and acceptWinner
      Should:
      setTheCurrentBettingRoundAsNull, callGetRandomIntegerOnBetTokenAuthorityToGetTheRandomInteger, callDetermineWinnerOfTheRuleClassByPassingTheSetOfBetsAndTheRandomValueToReturnBetResult, callAcceptWinnerOnAllConnectedMachinesAndPassBetResult, notSetWinnerWhenNoBetsWerePlaced, callLogEndBettingRoundWithNullAsResultIfNoBetsWereMade, callLogEndBettingRoundOnBetLoggingAuthorityWithCurrentBettingRoundAndBetResultAsParameters

    • isBettingRoundFinished

      public boolean isBettingRoundFinished() throws NoCurrentRoundException
      Description copied from interface: IGame
      determine if the right number of bets are done (determined by gamerules) to be able to calculate a winner. for calculation a winner, a true random value needs to be received from the gambling authority API. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API
      Returns:
      true if all necessary bets are made in the betting round, otherwise false
      Throws:
      NoCurrentRoundException - if the current betting round is null
      Should:
      callGetMaxBetsPerRoundOnGameRuleToGetTheMaximumNumberOfBets, callGetAllBetsMadeOnBettingRound, returnTrueWhenGetMaxBetsPerRoundIsPerceivedByComparingAllBetsMadeOnBettingRound, returnFalseWhenGetMaxBetsPerRoundIsNotPerceivedByComparingAllBetsMadeOnBettingRound, throwNoCurrentRoundExceptionWhenTheCurrentBettingRoundIsNull note: call required methods from API its done in determineWinner
